speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Just a normal sentence. Totally normal. Nothing weird about what I'm saying at all.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Yep. It’s all serious business. This is my serious face.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: How come you’re being all serious?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I’m sad now for some reason. Look at my sad face.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: But I don’t know why I’m sad. So now I’m questioning it.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Now I’m sad too. This is my face when I’m sad.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Now I’m being silly. Check out how zany I’m being.
